title: Foundational Accounting Project for Real-World Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills and Experience in Daily Economic Activities
context.additional_context: Small-group activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops), community-linked case studies

learning_goals: Application of double-entry bookkeeping principles while creating a budget plan for daily life
Analysis of small business cases to prepare balance sheets and income statements
Proposal of solutions to community problems (e.g., village festival budget management) through collaborative accounting approaches with team members

resources: Accounting Practice Software (Excel or Google Sheets)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
